text: Hey there :) How are you feeling today?
I'm fine how are you.
Not too bad, all things considered
Thats good to hear.  Where are you from?
U.S. How about you? Think they matched us with our complete opposites? :P
Same.  Maybe, I'm not sure.
Haha I am trying to figure out if you're a bot. I'm not, if you're wondering :) If you are you're pretty good. Congrats!
Lol.  I'm not a bot......
Haha nice, I'll take your word for it for now :) Ok if we talk about some serious stuff?
Sure, let's do it. I'm not sure if I'm donating to you or if you're donating to me.
Neither of us are donating to each other actually, which is probably a good thing. What have you heard about the charity called "Save the Children"?
Yes I have, I think they are from the UK.

They're international - a pretty solid, well-known organization with a good track record. Basically they work to protect children around the world. They fundraise and advocate for children suffering from disasters or war or poverty. So we have the opportunity today to donate some of our payment to them.
Do you work for them?
Nope, I don't work for them.
Okay, well I see that they have an A rating on charity watch with only 13% going to overhead.
They are pretty reputable. I think I'll donate a little bit to them. Maybe $0.50. Would you like to make a small donation from your task payment?
Sure, I will match your $0.50.
That's fantastic. Thank you :)
Thank you too.
Alright, well this has been fun :) Enjoy the rest of your day!
